ICI3D

Welcome to the ICI3D Program!

ICI3D provides junior researchers from the US and Africa with the toolsets necessary to conduct integrative research in infectious disease dynamics and to communicate their questions, methods, and findings across disciplinary boundaries.

Learn more Â»



The ICI3D program is supported by the National Institute of General Medical Sciences of the National Institutes of Health under award number R25GM102149.
